name: Ahnayro: The Dream World
description: Intense Puzzles Game - Explore the twisted and troubling world of Ahnayro, where your dreams are haunted by mysterious figures.
minimum_requirements: OS: WIndows X Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1280x720 or higher Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windowx X Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1280x720 or higher Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: It's not for everyone, but there's nothing else like it, on Steam or anywhere else.  As a game where the whole point is to Google the answers, the research-based puzzles are certainly unique.  The true benefit to this game, however, is a massive ARG, sitting at the most paranormal edge of the TBW universe.  In short, if you liked The Black Watchmen, you will like Ahnayro, but don't expect anything close to the same experience.

One of the best games, and my first ever ARG game, I've ever played. Solving clues to a puzzle has never been more exciting and frustrating (lol).  Really looking forward to these great developers and publishers with more ARG games to come!
